# CloudFlare Workers KV

If you are using Mesh on Cloudflare Workers, you can use
[_KV_](https://developers.cloudflare.com/workers/runtime-apis/kv/) as a storage.

To get started with this caching strategy, install it:

```sh npm2yarn
npm i @graphql-mesh/cache-cf-kw
```

## How to use?

```yaml filename=".meshrc.yaml"
cache:
  cf-kw:
    namespace: MY_MESH_CACHE
```

> If you need help with deploying GraphQL Mesh on CloudFlare Workers,
> [see our deployment recipes.](/docs/getting-started/deploy-mesh-gateway#deploy-mesh-on-cloudflare-workers)
